dlgLine.text: [NO RESPECT START] <You heard Fiona's voice carrying from a ways away, but it's only until you get closer that you see the target of her ire - Doug.>

dlgAnsw.text: [F] <Listen in carefully.>
[F] Oh boy, here we go...
[M] <Listen in carefully.>
[M] Oh boy, here we go...

dlgLine.text: [NO RESPECT F]...better take that back, or you - you'll be in a mess of trouble!
Oh really? From the likes of you? I was here from the beginning, need I remind you. And I gave <charname> a chance to show that she could run this place better than I could, and she barely succeeded.
You're a fool if you think you could do better than <charname>! She's twice - three times the person you are!
You don't say. You must know her so well, then. Do you know her favorite color? Her hopes and dreams? Her favorite killing move? Her preferred weapon? Her darkest... secret?
Well, I... I... well you certainly don't! Why would you?!
Oh? Don't I? What makes you so sure? And what are you going to do about it if I am a party to that information? Run over and ask <charname> every one of those questions, like a stammering fan?
How dare you, you vile man! You act like you're better than me, but you're a horrible pretender, and I will find a way to make you suffer!

dlgAnsw.text: [F] Doug, for God's sake, back off and quit being a dick.
[D] Fiona, take it easy! Doug's just having a little fun with you.
[N] Look, we're not getting anywhere when you two are fighting. Take a half day to remind yourselves we're all working for a common goal here.
[L] The both of you - shut up and focus! You really thing this is the best possible use of your time and skills?!
[I] <Ignore them.>

dlgLine.text: [NO RESPECT M]...better take that back, or you - you'll be in a mess of trouble!
Oh really? From the likes of you? I was here from the beginning, need I remind you. And I gave <charname> a chance to show that he could run this place better than I could, and he barely succeeded.
You're a fool if you think you could do better than <charname>! He's twice - three times the person you are!
You don't say. You must know him so well, then. Do you know his favorite color? His hopes and dreams? His favorite killing move? His preferred weapon? His darkest... secret?
Well, I... I... well you certainly don't! Why would you?!
Oh? Don't I? What makes you so sure? And what are you going to do about it if I am a party to that information? Run over and ask <charname> every one of those questions, like a stammering fan?
How dare you, you vile man! You act like you're better than me, but you're a horrible pretender, and I will find a way to make you suffer!

dlgAnsw.text: [F] Doug, for God's sake, back off and quit being a dick.
[D] Fiona, take it easy! Doug's just having a little fun with you.
[N] Look, we're not getting anywhere when you two are fighting. Take a half day to remind yourselves we're all working for a common goal here.
[L] The both of you - shut up and focus! You really thing this is the best possible use of your time and skills?!
[I] <Ignore them.>

dlgLine.text: [RESPECT START] <You heard Fiona's voice carrying from a ways away, but it's only until you get closer that you see the target of her ire - Doug.>

dlgAnsw.text: [F] <Approach carefully.>
[F] Uh oh...
[M] <Approach carefully.>
[M] Uh oh...

dlgLine.text: [RESPECT F]...better change your tone, or you - you'll be in a mess of trouble!

Oh really? From the likes of you? I was here from the beginning, need I remind you. And <charname> grew to trust me, and now we are as close as if I were her brother. No, closer - warriors, bound by blood.
What on earth are you talking about? She's not a warrior, she's intelligent, powerful, thoughtful - a perfect leader!
You don't say. You must know her so well, then. Do you know her favorite color? Her hopes and dreams? Her favorite killing move? Her preferred weapon? Her darkest... secret?
Well, I... I... well you certainly don't! Why would you?!
Oh? Don't I? What makes you so sure? And what are you going to do about it if I am a party to that information? Run over and ask <charname> every one of those questions, like a stammering fan?
How dare you, you vile man! You act like you're better than me, but you're a horrible pretender, and I will find a way to make you suffer!

dlgAnsw.text: [F] Doug, for God's sake, back off and quit being a dick.
[D] Fiona, take it easy! Doug's just having a little fun with you.
[N] Look, we're not getting anywhere when you two are fighting. Take a half day to remind yourselves we're all working for a common goal here.
[L] The both of you - shut up and focus! You really thing this is the best possible use of your time and skills?!
[I] <Ignore them.>

dlgLine.text: [RESPECT M]...better change your tone, or you - you'll be in a mess of trouble!

Oh really? From the likes of you? I was here from the beginning, need I remind you. And <charname> grew to trust me, and now we are as close as if I were his brother. No, closer - warriors, bound by blood.
What on earth are you talking about? He's not a warrior, he's intelligent, powerful, thoughtful - a perfect leader!
You don't say. You must know him so well, then. Do you know his favorite color? His hopes and dreams? His favorite killing move? His preferred weapon? His darkest... secret?
Well, I... I... well you certainly don't! Why would you?!
Oh? Don't I? What makes you so sure? And what are you going to do about it if I am a party to that information? Run over and ask <charname> every one of those questions, like a stammering fan?
How dare you, you vile man! You act like you're better than me, but you're a horrible pretender, and I will find a way to make you suffer!

dlgAnsw.text: [F] Doug, for God's sake, back off and quit being a dick.
[D] Fiona, take it easy! Doug's just having a little fun with you.
[N] Look, we're not getting anywhere when you two are fighting. Take a half day to remind yourselves we're all working for a common goal here.
[L] The both of you - shut up and focus! You really thing this is the best possible use of your time and skills?!
[I] <Ignore them.>

dlgLine.text: [LOST RESPECT START] <You heard Fiona's voice carrying from a ways away, but it's only until you get closer that you see the target of her ire - Doug.>

dlgAnsw.text: [F] <Approach silently>
[F] Ugh, I do not need this right now.
[M] <Approach silently>
[M] Ugh, I do not need this right now.

dlgLine.text: [LOST RESPECT F]...stop saying such awful lies, or you'll be in a mess of trouble!
Oh really? From the likes of you? I was here from the beginning, need I remind you. And <charname> once treated me as a blood brother... and she betrayed me. You don't know what she's capable of.
What on earth? She would never betray anyone! She's a true leader, not a cowardly, underhanded snake like you!
You don't say. You must know her so well, then. Do you know her favorite color? Her hopes and dreams? Her favorite killing move? Her preferred weapon? Her darkest... secret?
Well, I... I... well you certainly don't! Why would you?!
Oh? Don't I? What makes you so sure? And what are you going to do about it if I am a party to that information? Run over and ask <charname> every one of those questions, like a stammering fan?
How dare you, you vile man! You act like you're better than me, but you're a horrible pretender, and I will find a way to make you suffer!

dlgAnsw.text: [F] Doug, for God's sake, back off and quit being a dick.
[D] Fiona, take it easy! Doug's just having a little fun with you.
[N] Look, we're not getting anywhere when you two are fighting. Take a half day to remind yourselves we're all working for a common goal here.
[L] The both of you - shut up and focus! You really thing this is the best possible use of your time and skills?!
[I] <Ignore them.>

dlgLine.text: [LOST RESPECT M]...stop saying such awful lies, or you'll be in a mess of trouble!
Oh really? From the likes of you? I was here from the beginning, need I remind you. And <charname> once treated me as a blood brother... and he betrayed me. You don't know what he's capable of.
What on earth? He would never betray anyone! He's a true leader, not a cowardly, underhanded snake like you!
You don't say. You must know him so well, then. Do you know his favorite color? His hopes and dreams? His favorite killing move? His preferred weapon? His darkest... secret?
Well, I... I... well you certainly don't! Why would you?!
Oh? Don't I? What makes you so sure? And what are you going to do about it if I am a party to that information? Run over and ask <charname> every one of those questions, like a stammering fan?
How dare you, you vile man! You act like you're better than me, but you're a horrible pretender, and I will find a way to make you suffer!

dlgAnsw.text: [F] Doug, for God's sake, back off and quit being a dick.
[D] Fiona, take it easy! Doug's just having a little fun with you.
[N] Look, we're not getting anywhere when you two are fighting. Take a half day to remind yourselves we're all working for a common goal here.
[L] The both of you - shut up and focus! You really thing this is the best possible use of your time and skills?!
[I] <Ignore them.>

dlgLine.text: [F] Really? You think I'm the real antagonist in this situation? Fiona here was the one who came at me, full of anger. But fine, if you insist on appealing to unfair, chivalrist ways, I'll be going elsewhere.
Oh, thank you, <charname>! I knew you wouldn't let such slander stand. Thank you for coming to my defense!

dlgAnsw.text: Sure, just... run this along.

dlgLine.text: [D] What? You're a disgraceful man, Mister Schultz, and you carry a wake of disgrace around you that infects others with its... its... horribleness! You'll answer for it before long!
Yes, well... thanks for the support. I'll do my best to make sure I don't get entangled in such - time-wasting conversations in the future.

dlgAnsw.text: Sure, just... run this along.

dlgLine.text: [N] A goal - I suppose that's true enough. And a capable ally should understand that. I for one know I won't have any trouble with it, but I will take the offer of time off with regards.
I - I will as well! Certainly I don't require it but I will accept the kindness! <Fiona glares at Doug sidelong for a moment.>

dlgAnsw.text: Right. Now start learning to cooperate... or at least try and avoid each other.

dlgLine.text: [L] Of course it isn't. I admit I shouldn't have engaged in such a foolish argument, but you can't blame even the calmest warrior for attacking when their blood is up. <Doug nods.> I'll disengage.

<Fiona blinks, upset at Doug and cowed by the criticism.> I'm - I'm so sorry, <charname>. I just lost myself in the moment. I heard something that was awful, and I rushed to your defense, and I should know you can defend yourself. I meant no disrespect, I swear!

dlgAnsw.text: Right. Just carry on - like adults this time.

dlgLine.text: [I] Really? Suffer. That almost sounds like a genuine threat. I'd be nervous... if it came from just about anyone else.

You should be nervous! I'll speak with <charname> - and I'll make plain how horrible you truly are. <Fiona narrows her eyes, and speaks with surprising venom.> And if you don't change your ways, believe me, something drastic will happen!
<Doug actually looks slightly shaken for a moment before recovering his flippant composure.> I'm... sure. Super sure. You have fun thinking that, I'll just be going. To do something more important.

dlgAnsw.text: <Doug shuts off any responses and moves away.>
